inventory=[{"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 57, "index": 15}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 13, "index": 23}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_fence", "quantity": 20, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft gray glazed terracotta, I first need to craft gray terracotta. Gray terracotta requires placing 8 terracotta around gray dye in the middle. Therefore, I will start by moving a terracotta from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
